nodes.text: The Xexto con artist Freon Drevan operated a bootlegging business on the planet Troiken before 32 BBY. It was fully licensed but nevertheless sold knockoff merchandise that were produced in its factories. When fellow Xexto Niai Fieso was promoted to his side, the two expanded the business into a smuggling operation. Fieso embezzled credits and sold Drevan out to authorities; he fled the Troiken system before a raid landed Drevan in jail and lost him his business license.
